system.description: Any divination spell that attempts to look into the warded area receives a false image (as the major image spell) of your choice. You can change the image as desired. Successfully dispelling the false image reveals the real contents of the warded area, but does not dispel the false vision spell.

components.materialDescription: A small amount of velvet and a dab of honey. Focus: a piece of jade worth at least 250 gp.

system.target: 10-ft.-radius emanation from touched creature or object
